put.summary: Updates the properties of a particular JJ Dispute record based on the given values.

404.description: JJDispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: An invalid JJ Dispute status is provided. Update failed.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular JJDispute record to REVIEW.

404.description: JJDispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A JJDispute status can only be set to REVIEW iff status is NEW or VALIDATED and the remark must be <= 256 characters. Update failed.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular JJDispute record to REVIEW.

404.description: JJDispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A JJDispute status can only be set to ACCEPTED iff status is CONFIRMED. Update failed.

put.summary: Updates each JJ Dispute based on the passed in IDs (ticket number) to assign them to a specific JJ or unassign them if JJ not specified.

404.description: JJDispute record(s) not found. Update failed.
Not Found

put.summary: Updates the properties of a particular Dispute record based on the given values.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Delete failed.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to VALIDATED.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to VALIDATED iff status is NEW. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to PROCESSING.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to PROCESSING iff status is NEW or REJECTED. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to REJECTED.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to REJECTED iff status is NEW or VALIDATED and the rejected reason must be <= 256 characters. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

put.summary: Updates the emailVerification flag of a particular Dispute to true.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Dispute to update.

404.description: Dispute with specified id not found

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to CANCELLED.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to CANCELLED iff status is NEW, REJECTED or PROCESSING. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

get.summary: An endpoint hook to trigger the Unassign Dispute job.
get.description: A Dispute can be assigned to a specific user that "locks" the record for others. This endpoing manually triggers the Unassign Dispute job that clears the assignment of all Disputes that were assigned for more than 1 hour.

404.description: Not Found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The noticeOfDisputeId of the Dispute to retreive.

404.description: Dispute could not be found.

get.summary: An endpoint hook to trigger a redis rebuild of cached codetable data.
get.description: The codetables in redis are cached copies of data pulled from Oracle to ensure TCO remains stable. This data is periodically refreshed, but can be forced by hitting this endpoint.

404.description: Not Found
